result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. RANDY L ROBINSON

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on November 8, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Return date on December 5, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pre-Trial Status Report

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Return date on September 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.
(Sean Riordan)

10:23 AM Defendant Randy L. Robinson in court.  Attorney Matthew McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 2022CM3 & 2022CF75. Court questions defendant is he is getting an attorney. Statement by defendant. Court sets for Status of Counsel on July 12, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:26 AM
Second appearance scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on July 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report (Defendant is eligible for SPD, no attorney at this time.)

10:34 AM Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Def qualifies for the public defender but they have not yet found an attorney to represent him. Court sets status of counsel for May 31, 2022 at 10:00 AM. Statement by the def.

Court adjourned at 10:35 AM.
Second appearance scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on May 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report (Defendant is eligible for SPD, no attorney at this time)

10:14 AM Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON appeared in court, Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Def has contacted the public defender's office but they don't have one for him yet. Court informs the defendant that the public defender's office has requested a copy of the criminal complaint. Status of Counsel April 12, 2022 at 10:00 AM

Court adjourned at
Second appearance scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on April 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on March 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**

NO CONTACT with JH or his residence. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Never sent to GLSO.

NO CONTACT with JH or his residence. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:52 AM Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON appeared in court, Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant qualifies for the public defender. Atty confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court finds probable cause. Atty Kapelis enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on all counts on behalf of the defendant. DA Laspisa makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 signature bond and conditions of: NO CONTACT with JH or his residence. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status of Counsel on March 8, 2022 at 10:00 AM. Court quashes warrant.

Court adjourned at 9:54 AM.
Never sent to GLSO.
Initial appearance on January 25, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Def called and stated he was in the hospital which was why he missed court this morning. Def's phone number and address were verified. Def was given a new court date of January 25, 2022 at 9:00 AM. Def stated he would be here in person.

9:48 AM Defendant RANDY L ROBINSON not in court, Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Court orders a warrant - forthwith.

Court adjourned at 9:48 AM
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
